source_sentence: 金剛頂經毘盧遮那一百八尊法
translation: The One Hundred and Eight Honored Dharmas of the Vajraśekhara-sūtra

source_sentence: 身契印
translation: bodily mudrā

source_sentence: 善無畏三藏一行和上同譯
translation: Shan wu fearless sanzang jing和上同譯三藏一行和上

source_sentence: 一切如來入自己身密語。
translation: All the tathāgatas enter their own body and speak esoteric words.

source_sentence: 稽首毘盧遮那佛　　一切如來金剛頂
translation: homage to Vairocana Buddha, the adamantine peak of all tathāgatas

source_sentence: 唵　薩　嚩　怛　他　揭　多　阿　毘　三　菩　提涅哩　荼(堅牢)　跋　折羅　底　瑟吒(一切如來正等菩提金剛堅牢安住我心)金剛薩埵大心。
translation: Om, saṃsākyamuni, tathāgata, and so forth, the vajrasattva's great mind of Vajrasattva-samyakṣiṣṭha (all tathāgatas who correctly attain enlightenment are adamantine and firmly resting in my mind), which is the great mind of Vajra.

source_sentence: 南　無　三　曼　哆　勃　陀　喃　唵　跋　折囉薩　埵　摩　訶　三　昧　耶　莎　訶金剛王　唵　跋　折囉　阿　閦　鞞　阿　鼻　詵者　鑁　莎　訶金剛峯　唵　跋　折囉　阿羅　怛那　三　婆頗　莎　訶金剛命　唵　跋　折囉　盧　計　攝伐　羅　阿羅　穰　莎　訶金剛座　唵　跋　折囉　阿　目　佉　悉　地　莎訶金剛首　唵　跋　折囉　薩　埵　莎　訶金剛壇　唵　跋　折囉　阿羅　穰　莎　訶金剛密　唵　跋　折囉　底　瑟吒　莎　訶金剛持　唵　跋　折囉　蜜多　莎　訶金剛界　唵　跋　折囉　涅里　瑟[打-丁+致]　麼　吒莎　訶金剛觀　唵　跋　折囉　薩怛梵　莎　訶金剛喜　唵　跋　折囉　三　昧　耶　護　素　喇多　薩怛梵　莎　訶金剛心　唵　跋　折囉　畔　馱　怛喇　吒　莎訶金剛智　唵　跋　囉　吠　捨　阿　莎　訶金剛意　唵　跋　折囉　母　瑟知　梵　莎　訶金剛勝　唵　跋　折囉　[合*牛]　泮　吒　莎　訶金剛契　唵　跋　折囉　質　多　鉢羅　底　迷曇　迦　嚕　弭　莎　訶金剛月　唵　跋　折囉　菩　提　質　多　母　怛播那　夜　弭　莎　訶金剛空　唵　底　瑟吒　跋　日囉　莎　訶金剛池　唵　薩頗　羅　跋　日囉　莎　訶金剛廣　唵　僧　訶　羅　跋　日囉　莎　訶金剛祕　唵　跋　日囉　涅里　荼　底　瑟吒莎　訶金剛堅　唵　跋　日囉　阿　怛摩　拘　含　莎訶金剛尊　唵　跋　日囉　薩　埵縛　阿　地　瑟吒莎　訶金剛甲(吽迦羅金剛藏)　唵　跋　日囉　那　咁　莎　訶金剛語　唵　跋　日囉　都　使曳　護　莎　訶金剛請　唵　跋　日囉　三　漫　若　若　莎　訶金剛鉤　唵　跋　日囉　阿　夜　兮　若　莎　訶金剛索　唵　跋　日囉　阿　奚　吽　吽　莎訶金剛鎖　唵　跋　日囉　奚　薩普　吒　鑁　莎訶金剛鈴　唵　跋　日囉　犍　吒　惡　惡　莎　訶金剛鐸　唵　跋　日囉　俱　舍　穰　莎　訶金剛吟　唵　跋　日囉　薩　埵　僧　伽羅　訶莎　訶金剛詠　唵　跋　日囉　娑　羅　娑　羅　魯　波儞　莎　訶金剛念　唵　跋　日囉　薄　伽　梵　素　喇　多莎　訶金剛誦　唵　跋　日囉　喇　怛曩　莎　訶金剛歌　唵　跋　日囉　奚　室　盧　哆　羅　燥歌也　莎　訶金剛舞　唵　跋　日囉　奚　際　莎　訶金剛戲　唵　跋　日囉　摩　訶　耶　莎　訶金剛笑　唵　跋　日囉　賀　娑　縛　訶　莎　訶金剛香　唵　跋　日囉　鉢羅　喝　羅　尼　莎訶金剛花　唵　跋　日囉　迦　謎　莎　訶金剛鬘　唵　跋　日囉　奚　盧　波　輸　鞞　莎訶金剛燈　唵　跋　日囉　素　底　若　擬哩　莎訶金剛照　唵　跋　日囉　阿　羅　伽　耶　泥　莎訶金剛室　唵　跋　日囉　婆　娑　度　那　莎　訶金剛藏　唵　跋　日囉　三　昧　耶　薩　埵　阿莎　訶金剛雲　唵　跋　日囉　素　揵　蕩　霓　莎　訶金剛法　唵　跋　日囉　薩　埵　三　昧　耶　摩弩　波　羅　耶　莎　訶金剛雨　唵　跋　日囉　帝　乞瑟那　莎　訶金剛生　唵　跋　日囉　羅　細　護　莎　訶金剛牙　唵　跋　日囉　藥　乞瑟　吽　莎　訶金剛日　唵　跋　日囉　阿　莎　訶金剛色　唵　跋　日囉　阿羅　怛曩　莎　訶金剛宮　唵　跋　日囉　羯　摩　莎　訶金剛城　唵　跋　日囉　弭　塞普　羅　捺　羅乞沙　唬吽　莎　訶金剛[檎-离+土]　唵　跋　日囉　枳　羅　唬吽　泮　莎訶金剛牆　唵　跋　日囉　縒　羅　縒　羅　迦　羅耶　吽　莎　訶金剛網　唵　跋　日囉　摩　訶　薩　者　里　莎訶金剛殿　唵　跋　日囉　尾　賒　護　莎　訶金剛幢　唵　跋　日囉　跋　折[口*藍]　吽　莎　訶金剛塔　唵　跋　日囉　跋　折隷　吽　莎　訶金剛臺　唵　跋　日囉　素　都　那　吽　莎　訶金剛鏡　唵　跋　日囉　達　摩　費　莎　訶金剛水　唵　跋　日囉　入伐　羅　吽　莎　訶金剛際　唵　跋　日囉　羯　摩　莎　訶金剛輪　唵　跋　日囉　曳　都　莎　訶金剛光　唵　跋　日囉　遏　利他　鉢栗　那莎　訶金剛焰摩德迦　唵　跋　日囉　波　舍　吽　莎訶金剛業　唵　跋　日囉　散　地　耶　悉　多　莎訶金剛定　唵　跋　日囉　底　穰　莎　訶金剛慧　唵　跋　日囉　都　計　莎　訶金剛忍　唵　跋　日囉　達　里摩　莎　訶金剛力　唵　跋　日囉　阿　羅　曳　莎　訶金剛願　唵　跋　日囉　賀　娑　耶　莎　訶金剛因　唵　跋　日囉　擬　提　曳　莎　訶金剛緣　唵　跋　日囉　補　瑟鞞　莎　訶金剛論　唵　跋　日囉　杜　鞞　里　莎　訶金剛義　唵　跋　日囉　薩部　吒　莎　訶金剛淨　唵　跋　日囉　薩　沙　耶　莎　訶金剛受　唵　跋　日囉　怛　那　曳　莎　訶金剛手　唵　跋　日囉　悉　地　耶　莎　訶金剛錫　唵　跋　日囉　羯　磨　悉　地　沙　訶金剛傘　唵　跋　日囉　阿　藍　莎　訶金剛身　唵　跋　日囉　怛里　都　莎　訶金剛禪　唵　跋　日囉　薩　埵　里　莎　訶金剛剎　唵　跋　日囉　阿　目　佉　悉　地　莎訶金剛仙　唵　跋　日囉　摩　尼　達　里　泮　吒莎　訶金剛印　唵　跋　日囉　姥　涅里　提　莎　訶金剛埵　唵　跋　日囉　怛摩　句　痕　莎　訶金剛山　唵　跋　日囉　若　蘗　里　莎　訶金剛忿怒王　唵　跋　日囉　枳　里　枳里　唬吽莎　訶金剛縛　唵　跋　日囉　怛羅　吒　莎　訶金剛杵　唵　跋　日囉　瑟　那　琰　莎　訶金剛場　唵　跋　日囉　菩　提　悉　怛摩　莎訶金剛地　唵　跋　日囉　阿　那　薩　埵　里　莎訶金剛寶　唵　跋　日囉　摩　儞　阿　素　佉　莎訶金剛覺　唵　跋　日囉　揭　鞞　莎　訶金剛劍　唵　跋　日囉　羯　喇磨　莎　訶金剛利　唵　跋　日囉　阿　閦　鞞　里　莎　訶金剛拳　唵　跋　日囉　那　伽　吒　莎　訶金剛箭　唵　跋　日囉　羅　乞叉　含　莎　訶金剛磬　唵　跋　日囉　摩　儞　薩　埵　莎　訶金剛渠　唵　跋　日囉　含　含　含　護　薄　伽梵　莎　訶金剛瓶　唵　跋　日囉　都　浪　揭　提　莎　訶金剛主　唵　跋　日囉　阿　姪　力　莎　訶金剛聲　唵　跋　日囉　涅里　帝　訖里吒　莎訶金剛子　唵　跋　日囉　擬　提　擬　提　吽　莎訶金剛姥　唵　跋　日羅　呵　呵　呵　唬吽　唬吽　莎　訶佛告金剛密菩薩摩訶薩。
translation: In the south, there are three kinds of ghosts.

source_sentence: 說此金剛尊悉地印契及密言字。
translation: He teaches this sign of the vajra-honored siddhi mudrā and esoteric words.

source_sentence: 住大寂靜遠離一切心。
translation: He abides in great quiescence and is far removed from all minds.

source_sentence: 於月愛三昧白毫輪中。
translation: In the white-haired wheel of the moon-love samādhi.

source_sentence: 次第觀照分明普現。
translation: They are sequentially observed and illuminated in order to clearly reveal their universal manifestation.

source_sentence: 一切如來金剛大摩尼如意之寶。
translation: It's the wish-granting treasure of all the Tathāgata's vajra great maṇi.

source_sentence: 同一法性一真法界一味如如。
translation: They are the same Dharma nature, one true Dharma realm, one flavor, and thusness of the Dharma realm.

source_sentence: 不來不去無相無為。
translation: It doesn't come or go, has no marks and nothingness, and is unconstructed.

source_sentence: 清淨法身照圓寂海。
translation: The pure Dharma body of the Buddha illuminates the ocean of perfect quiescence.

source_sentence: 如是八百金剛句　　本從三昧一法生
translation: Thus, these eight hundred adamantine phrases originally arose from the single principle of concentration

source_sentence: 觀照真如不二門　　得入如來圓寂海
translation: of the nonduality of contemplation and illumination of reality, entering into the ocean of perfect quiescence of the Buddhas;

source_sentence: 善知出句及入句　　瑜伽悉地諸儀式
translation: He knows well the rituals for producing and entering phrases, yoga, and attainment.

source_sentence: 菩提萬行剎那修　　永離無始諸迷惑
translation: Enlightenment, which consists of the realization of all its practices at one and the same time, is free of beginningless confusion.

source_sentence: 八萬四千妙法門　　一字真言印契入
translation: eighty-four thousand marvelous teachings of the one-character seal of the true words that enter

source_sentence: 恒沙功德不可算　　廣度眾生無限極
translation: The merit of the Buddha is incalculable, and his liberation for all living beings is infinite.

source_sentence: 人空法空自性空　　一真法界本來空
translation: The emptiness of the self-nature of dharmas is the emptiness of person, and the emptiness of things is the original emptiness of the single true dharmadhātu.

source_sentence: 十方調御諸等覺　　咸依如是金剛句
一句一契一真言　　先從心輪頂上布
translation: one phrase, one accord, one true saying, first spreads it from the top of the mind-wheel

source_sentence: 兩肩左右耳雙尖　　白毫髮際眉間注
translation: Both shoulders and left and right ears are pointed, with white hair between their eyebrows.

source_sentence: 頸上二頰人中相　　脣齒眼腭咽喉中
translation: the two cheeks above the neck of a bodhisattva in the human condition, the lips, teeth, eyes, palate, and throat

source_sentence: 兩臂十指波羅蜜　　胸前背後二雙足
translation: the two-armed, ten-fingered pāramitā with two pairs of legs at the front and behind the chest

source_sentence: 臍輪次上金剛宮　　心王明月藏中住
translation: Above the navel, next to the diamond palace, is the abode of the moon-store of the king of minds.

source_sentence: 珠幢寶傘遍莊嚴　　無相無來亦無去
translation: It is adorned with pearls, banners, jeweled umbrellas, signless, without marks, without coming or going.

source_sentence: 二目蓮華金剛燈　　喜戲塗香鼻根處
translation: the two-eyed lotus, the vajra lamp, the joyful play, the odor and nose faculty

source_sentence: 安坐悉地金剛輪　　清淨光明如滿月
translation: He sat cross-legged on the adamantine wheel of enlightenment, shining purely like a full moon

source_sentence: 如是身心一百八　　次第觀想令明淨
translation: Thus, the one hundred and eighth bodies of body and mind are observed in order to make them clear and pure

source_sentence: 頓悟祕密菩提契　　自在遊行涅槃路
translation: Suddenly awakening to the secret enlightenment pact, he freely travels the path of nirvāṇa

source_sentence: 安立世間悉地竟　　然依灌頂作持誦
translation: Having settled the world, he accomplishes attainment of enlightenment, yet he makes offerings to it and recites it.

source_sentence: 真是如來勝生子　　滿足清白一乘法
translation: It is truly the Tathāgata’s supreme birth-and-growth son who fulfills the pure and white teaching of the One Vehicle.

source_sentence: 天魔軍眾見是人　　合掌稱云救世者
復言金剛不動智　　究竟成佛法身處
瑜伽勝義品中說　　瞻仰由如世導師
translation: It's explained in the Chapter on the Ultimate Meaning of the Yogâcārabhūmi-śāstra that the Bhagavān is like a worldly guide.

source_sentence: 傳薄伽梵祕密門　　八部龍天咸敬仰
translation: Biographies of the Blessed One’s Secret Teachings, All honored by the gods and dragons of the eightfold order

source_sentence: 欲行欲坐念誦時　　出淨入淨語言相
translation: He may follow the ways of pure speech, but he may follow the ways of impure speech.

source_sentence: 口含金色跋折囉　　二目麼吒除宿障
translation: His mouth contains the golden-colored vajra, and his two maṇḍalas remove the constellate hindrances.

source_sentence: 恒思明月鏡中坐　　廓周法界虛空量
translation: He always contemplates the moon of light sitting in a mirror, extending space throughout the cosmos.

source_sentence: 心得自在無去來　　功德常行普迴向
translation: Their minds are self-contained, without going or coming; their virtues are always practiced and universally dedicated.

source_sentence: 入法身觀門
translation: approach of entering into the contemplation of the Dharma body

source_sentence: 稽首毘盧遮那佛　　一切如來金剛頂
translation: homage to Vairocana Buddha, the adamantine peak of all tathāgatas

source_sentence: 於大法界道場中　　一心觀想分明見
translation: in the great enlightenment-practice-field of the Dharma realm, he contemplates with one mind and clearly sees

source_sentence: 妙高殊特大希有　　神通聖力登其上
translation: It is marvelously high and extraordinarily rare, surpassed only by the holy power of supernatural knowledge.

source_sentence: 遍觀十方諸佛剎　　如在掌內摩尼珠
translation: He pervades all the buddha-fields of the ten directions like a maṇi-pearl in his palm

source_sentence: 悟此三昧首楞嚴　　安住如來吉祥地
稽首毘盧遮那佛　　一切如來金剛王
translation: homage to Vairocana Buddha, the vajra king of all tathāgatas

source_sentence: 自在光明寂滅海　　十方善覺稱無上
translation: the ocean of independent light and tranquility, which is called unsurpassed by the well-awarenesses of all directions

source_sentence: 恒沙功德悉圓滿　　無相清淨等真空
translation: the virtues of the sands of the Ganges are all perfected, such as the signless and pure vacuum

source_sentence: 悟此三昧菩提契　　安住如來吉祥地
稽首毘盧遮那佛　　一切如來金剛峯
translation: homage to Vairocana Buddha, the Vajrapāṇi of All Tathāgatas

source_sentence: 頂相無邊不可見　　超出十方世界海
translation: The top of the mountain has no limit and cannot be seen beyond the ocean of worlds in the ten directions.

source_sentence: 千巖萬谷摩尼寶　　映現瑠璃水精器
translation: thousand cliffs and myriad valleys of maṇi treasures reflected in the lapis lazuli crystal vessel

source_sentence: 悟此三昧萬像寶　　安住如來吉祥地
稽首毘盧遮那佛　　一切如來金剛命
translation: homage to Vairocana Buddha, the adamantine life of all tathāgatas

source_sentence: 壽量無窮不可算　　水鳥樹林極樂地
translation: Their lifespans are infinite and incalculable, like water, birds, trees, and the heaven of ultimate bliss.

source_sentence: 人於花內颯然生　　鳥出珠中法音詠
菩薩沐浴金沙水　　一念十方受記竟
translation: The bodhisattva bathed in the water of golden sands. In a single thought he received the prediction of enlightenment in all ten directions.

source_sentence: 悟此速疾不退觀　　安住如來吉祥地
稽首毘盧遮那佛　　一切如來金剛座
translation: homage to Vairocana Buddha, the adamantine throne of all buddhas

source_sentence: 海印恒沙悉地寶　　無邊善逝登其上
translation: The ocean seal is the jewel of the eternal sands of the siddhânta-stage, where Boundlessly Enlightened One ascends.

source_sentence: 圓光法界無障礙　　如觀水月鏡中像
translation: the unobstructed, perfect light of the cosmos, like the reflection in a mirror of the water moon.

source_sentence: 師子頂戴滿虛空　　七寶金蓮珠傘帳
translation: the lion's head is covered with space, seven-jeweled gold lotus pearl umbrella curtain

source_sentence: 悟此三昧悉地契　　安住如來吉祥地
translation: Having entered this concentration, he dwells in the sphere of the auspicious sign of the Tathāgata.

source_sentence: 稽首毘盧遮那佛　　一切如來金剛身
translation: homage to Vairocana Buddha, the adamantine body of all tathāgatas

source_sentence: 廓周法界無邊量　　隨方應現滿虛空
translation: boundless and infinite as the cosmos, it fills space everywhere.

source_sentence: 能以一身為多身　　復現多身一身相
translation: He can show the characteristics of many bodies with one body and many bodies

source_sentence: 有身有相權來化　　非身非相是無為
translation: The absence of body and marks is the uncompounded.

source_sentence: 悟此三昧涅槃宮　　得入如來吉祥地
translation: He entered the sphere of the auspicious signs and signs of the Tathāgata,

source_sentence: 毘盧遮那悉地流出相應句陀羅尼。
translation: The phrase dhāraṇī associated with the flowing out of Vairocana's attainment of enlightenment.

source_sentence: 南　麼　薩　婆　怛　他(引)　蘖　帝　[口*驃](毘庾反)(一)　微濕嚩(二合)　目　契　弊(毘也反)　薩　婆　他　阿　阿(引)暗　噁(四)靈雲校本末云　貞享三年五月三日校了　淨嚴(四十八載)
translation: 南。麼 薩 婆 他(引)  帝 [口*](毘庾反)(一) 微濕(二合) 目 契 弊(毘也反) 薩 婆他 阿 阿 阿(引)暗 噁(四)靈雲校本末云 貞享三年五月三日校了 淨嚴
